info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 7:56PM MST until January 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snow intensity lessens tonight. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches from Helmville to MacDonald Pass. 1 to 4 inches elsewhere. Strong southwest winds gusting to 45 mph will develop tonight into Friday along the Divide and cause blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Butte, Georgetown Lake, Highway 12 Garrison to Elliston, Homestake Pass, and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
